mapper.select: select id from member where id = (select hex( aes_encrypt( #{ id }, #{key} ) )) )
mapper.insert: insert into member values( null, (select hex( aes_encrypt( #{ id }, #{ key } ) )), (SELECT SHA2(#{ password }, 512)), (select hex( aes_encrypt( #{ name }, #{ key } ) )), (select hex( aes_encrypt( #{ email }, #{ key } ) )), (select hex( aes_encrypt( #{ birth }, #{ key } ) )), #{ gender }, (select hex( aes_encrypt( #{ phone }, #{ key } ) )), current_timestamp(), default, 'Y' )
